ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed
1 butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into small slices
2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or more to taste

cookingTips: Toss vegetables with oil and season before roasting to ensure even coating
Roast at 400Â°F for 30-35 minutes until edges are caramelized and tender

enrichment.coachingPrompt: What role does the goat cheese play in balancing the natural sweetness of roasted squash and sweet potato?
